subject: Memorabilia and Souvenirs
Baseball
Advertising and Marketing
Collectors and Collections
lead_paragraph: It’s not clear what kind of memorializing and monetizing of his final season Jeter will approve, but the sports collectibles business is well prepared to cash in.
